forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
